titlestmt.titleproper: Roll Book of the Tucson Central Trades Council, 1922-1932
Roll Book of the Tucson Central Trades Council

change.item: This finding aid was manually revised and updated to EAD 2.0 specifications by Sara Filion

did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Roll Book of the Tucson Central Trades Council 1922-1932
did.abstract: Roll call for weekly meetings; lists unions and their representatives at the meetings, including barbers, bricklayers, boilermakers, carpenters, culinary workers, lathers, musicians, painters, printers, pressmen, signalmen, post office clerks, and others.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Roll Book of the Tucson Central Trades Council (AZ 153). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Represented all trade unions in the City of Tucson.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Roll call for weekly meetings; lists unions and their representatives at the meetings, including barbers, bricklayers, boilermakers, carpenters, culinary workers, lathers, musicians, painters, printers, pressmen, signalmen, post office clerks, and others.
